title: Ensembling Algorithm for Average Precision Metric
description: Ensembling can be a valuable tool for combining the insights of many different machine learning models.  Given the nature of this problem (rank the 5 most likely), a different ensembling algorithm than mere averaging must be used.  Here, I employ an ensembling algorithm that was recently very successful in a recent image recognition competition, Quick! Draw! Doodle Recognition Challenge.
description_lemmatized: ensembling valuable tool combining insight many different machine learning model given nature problem rank 5 likely different ensembling algorithm mere averaging must used employ ensembling algorithm recently successful recent image recognition competition quick draw doodle recognition challenge
